description: An illustration of a person wearing a hot dog costume: the costume itself consists of a hot dog in between two buns with a zigzag line of mustard down the hot dog; the person wearing the costume has on a black long-sleeved shirt, black pants, and red shoes, all of which are seen outside of the costume. The costume-wearer is posed in a lunging stance with the left leg bent before them and the right leg extending behind; both the costume wearer's arms are bent with their fists at their waist in a triumphant pose.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
